metadata.name: Azure Monitoring
metadata.description: Creates an Application Insights instance and a Log Analytics workspace.
Required. The resource portal dashboards name.
Required. The resource insights components name.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Required. The resource operational insights workspaces name.
Optional. Tags of the resource.

metadata.name: Operational Insights Workspaces
metadata.description: Creates a Log Analytics workspace.
Required. The resource operational insights workspaces name.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
The resource group the operational insights workspace was deployed into.
The resource ID of the loganalytics workspace.
The name of the loganalytics workspace.

metadata.name: Application Insights Components
metadata.description: Creates an Application Insights instance based on an existing Log Analytics workspace.
Required. The resource insights components name.
Required. The resource portal dashboards name.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
The resource ID of the loganalytics workspace.
Optional. Tags of the resource.

metadata.name: Azure Portal Dashboard
metadata.description: Creates a dashboard for an Application Insights instance.
Required. The portal dashboard name.
Required. The resource insights components name.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.

chart.title: Average processor and process CPU utilization
